name: Plasma Gun
note: The two moves have no ammo cost. You don't have to be able to see your target when you play the card. For example, you can move 2 squares and shoot a target you now see. You cannot use 1 move before shooting and 1 move after.

baseEffect.name: Basic effect
baseEffect.description: Deal 2 damage to 1 target you can see.

firstExtraEffect.name: Phase Glide
firstExtraEffect.description: Move 1 or 2 squares. This effect can be used either before or after the basic effect.

secondExtraEffect.name: Charged shot
secondExtraEffect.description: Deal 1 additional damage to your target.
